item.title: Markdown monsters
item.description: Whenever I take an interest in something I think to myself, “How can I combine this with R?” This post is the result of applying that attitude to Dungeons and Dragons. So how would I combine D&D with R? A good start would be to have a nice data set of Dungeons and Dragons monsters, with all of their statistics, abilities and attributes. One of the core D&D rule books is the Monster Manual.
